summary: This bill, the Marsh-Billings-Rockefeller National Historical Park Establishment Act Amendments Act of 2025, aims to expand the boundaries of the Marsh-Billings-Rockefeller National Historical Park in Vermont. It outlines specific inclusions within the new boundaries, including historic and protection zones. Furthermore, it modifies land acquisition procedures for the park, specifying permissible uses for acquired land, particularly the King Farm. The bill also establishes a National Park Service Stewardship Institute at the park to promote stewardship practices and collaboration.
